snippet: A retiree qualified for lower car insurance premiums, but found that out only after a chance piece of mail prodded him to call his insurer.
abstract: Tara Siegel Bernard Your Money column relates that a retiree qualified for lower car insurance premiums, but found that out only after a chance piece of mail prodded him to call his insurer; points out the onus is on the customer to do the work to find the best deal, whether it is a big-ticket item like car insurance or smaller bills from their cellphone or cable provider.
lead_paragraph: A retiree qualified for lower car insurance premiums, but found that out only after a chance piece of mail prodded him to call his insurer.

headline.seo: Want Better Car Insurance Rates? You Have to Make the Call - Your Money
headline.main: Car Policy for Less, but Only if You Call
headline.print_headline: Car Policy For Less, But Only If You Call
